title: Kogel Bearings Announces 80 Custom Bottom Bracket Colors
content:
If youâ€™re in the market for some extra color for your next build, Kogel Bearings just announced an all-new custom color program for its bottom bracket line. You have 80 custom colors and tones to choose from, ranging from eye-burning, bright yellow to coyote tan and a whole lot in between. These colors are done with Cerakote and the retail for any of the models is $360, including ceramic bearings. Spin on over to Kogel to see more.
